com.cs309.loginscreen.Presenter

Class ChatPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs309.loginscreen.Presenter.ChatPresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServerListener

    public class ChatPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServerListener
    Chat presenter class that handles the logic for the Chat class. It handles the ServerRequest to send Login info, logout info, and change of status for the Chat user. It implements IServerListener for listening to the server responses.
